subject: Re: Can I get some help, please?
body:
Carl T. Miller (millerc@cantonpl.org) wrote on 20 May 2007 11:03:
 >What I'd like is to be able to test a file in the archive to know
 >whether or not I'm working with an official mirror.  It sounds
 >like there isn't a good way to do this.

What's an official mirror? You might call the ftp..debian.org
official but content-wise all the ones listed in the mirror page
should be equivalent for the archs they have.


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
